name: Bracket
title: bracketapp.nl
shortDescription: Bracket is a free, open-source tournament management system designed to offer flexibility and ease of use for organizing sports or gaming events. Users can build tournament setups, schedule matches, and track scores, all while presenting live rankings to the public. It's ideal for community organizers, sports leagues, and gaming tournaments looking for a customizable and cost-effective solution.
pros: Flexible setup for various tournament types
No vendor lock-in or data collection
cons: Limited support compared to paid tools
May require technical skill to deploy

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Challonge
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers robust tournament tools with a focus on gaming
